name: Virizion
flavorText:
This Pokémon fought humans in order
to protect its friends. Legends about it
continue to be passed down.

previous.name: Terrakion
previous.flavorText:
This Pokémon came to the defense of
Pokémon that had lost their homes in
a war among humans.

next.name: Tornadus
next.flavorText:
The lower half of its body is wrapped in
a cloud of energy. It zooms through
the sky at 200 mph.
next.formDescription:
Forms have different stats and abilities.  Tornadus switches forms when the reveal glass is used on it.

The Reveal Glass may be obtained by taking a Therian landorus to abundant shrine.  (Landorus can be obtained in Therian Forme from the Dream Radar.)

This Pokémon fought humans in order
to protect its friends. Legends about it
continue to be passed down.
